trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller en implementering av en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The provider works in a similar fashion to the Microsoft .NET Framework standard licensing model.
trans-unit.target: Providern fungerar på liknande sätt att Microsoft .NET Framework standard licensieringsmodell.

trans-unit.source: The LicFileLicenseProvider offers <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: LicFileLicenseProvider erbjuder <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>och <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method determines whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> retrieved by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> method is valid.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoden avgör om den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>hämtas av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A>metoden är giltig.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from this class, you can override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method to provide your own validation logic.
trans-unit.target: När du ärver från den här klassen, kan du åsidosätta den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metod för att ge dina egna valideringslogik.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class exists to provide similar licensing functionality to COM licensing and uses text license files.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen finns för att ge liknande licensiering funktionalitet för COM och använder text licensfiler.

trans-unit.source: For more information on licensing, see [How to: License Components and Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om licensiering finns [så här: licens komponenter och kontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Returns a key for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en nyckel för den angivna typen.

trans-unit.source: The object type to return the key.
trans-unit.target: Objekttyp som ska returnera nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: A confirmation that the type parameter is licensed.
trans-unit.target: En bekräftelse som den type parameter är licensierad.

trans-unit.source: Returns a license for the instance of the component, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en licens för instansen av komponenten, om det inte finns.

trans-unit.source: At design time, the GetLicense method looks for a license file named `myClassName.LIC`, where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component to create.
trans-unit.target: När du designar metoden GetLicense söker efter en licensfil som heter `myClassName.LIC`, där `myClassName` är den <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>för att skapa komponenten.</xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This file must be in the same directory as the .dll file that contains the component.
trans-unit.target: Den här filen måste vara i samma katalog som DLL-filen som innehåller komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Next, this method checks the first line of the license file against a key specified in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Därefter kontrollerar den här metoden den första raden i licensfilen mot en nyckel som anges i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.IsKeyValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the key is valid, this line is used as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om nyckeln är giltig, används den här raden som <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"></xref> that specifies where you can use the licensed object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext"> </xref> som anger där du kan använda objektet licensierade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the component requesting the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar den komponent som begär den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An object that requests the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som begär den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"></xref> should be thrown when a component cannot be granted a license; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LicenseException"> </xref> uppstod när en komponent inte kan beviljas en licens, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A valid <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find a valid or a valid context parameter, it returns .
trans-unit.target: Om den här metoden inte kan hitta en giltig eller en giltig context parametern, returnerar .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the key that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*> method retrieves is valid for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Anger om nyckeln som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*>metoden hämtar är giltig för den angivna typen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.LicFileLicenseProvider.GetLicense*>

trans-unit.source: This method checks the key against the phrase: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", where `myClassName` is the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A> of the component you want to create.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden kontrollerar nyckeln mot frasen: " `myClassName is a licensed component.` ", där `myClassName` är den <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>av den komponent som du vill skapa.</xref:System.Type.FullName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*> to check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>att kontrollera.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the component requesting the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerar den komponent som begär den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.License"> </xref>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*> for the specified type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om nyckeln är en giltig <xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>för den angivna typen, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.License.LicenseKey*>
